resources.string: Choose the number that is higher. \nQuestions can be repeated until you reach 20 points.

"Congratulations, you have passed the level! \nDid you know that the number 7 is considered the luckiest number. There are 7 days a week, 7 continents, 7 colors of the rainbow, 7 musical notes, 7 days of Creation, and more. Also, the number 7 is most often the favorite number of people all over the world."
Choose the larger Roman numeral. \nQuestions can be repeated until you reach 20 points.
"Congratulations, you have passed the level! \nDid you know that there is no zero in Roman numerals?"
Which animal shows the tongue more? \ nQuestions can be repeated until you reach 20 points.
"Congratulations, you have passed the level! \ N Did you know? That a woodpecker, when it strikes a tree with its beak, draws in its tongue and wraps it around its brain to protect it."
Choose something edible. \ nQuestions can be repeated until you reach 20 points.
"Congratulations, level passed! / N Many crocodiles are known to swallow rocks. But not because they are edible to them. The stones help them sink into the water faster and stay at the bottom."
